name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit; apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk; wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.5.3/binaries/apache-maven-3.5.3-bin.tar.gz; tar -xvzf apache-maven-3.5.3-bin.tar.gz; export M2_HOME=/content/apache-maven-3.5.3; export PATH=$PATH:$M2_HOME/bin; echo 'âœ… Packages installed and Requirements met'

postAttachCommand.server: wget https://download.java.net/java/GA/jdk11/9/GPL/openjdk-11.0.2_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz; tar -xvzf openjdk-11.0.2_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz; streamlit run streamlit_app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
